Name: Burn Up
Effect: Single Target. Lethal. After Damage is dealt, the User loses its Fire Type. If its only type was Fire, it is now Typeless. User's Physical & Special Fire-Type Moves have Power 0. Whole Scene Duration. This Effect does not end by switching out the User.
Description: The User unleashes all of its might through a massive blast of raging fire. Although the damage is devastating the Pokemon is left unable to produce more fire for at least a day.
